page.title: 05FARMING TRENDS IN WOODLAND
page.content: All the farmers{slurry}goes into a tank then onto the fields.Unlike other peoples sewerage system ours goes onto the fields.{Our farm equipment:-}crop sprayer,muck pusher,hayturner,cock pheasant,wuffler,buckrake,cattle crush,trailer,horse-box,plough, cultivator,rotivator,grass cutter,muck spreader,straw trailer,elevator flat eight grab,tanko power grab,moleplough thistle cutter,link box chain harrows, chemical spreader and seed harrows. All our tractors run on diesel.Diesel is a lot cheaper than petrol.Petrol is Â£2.10 a gallon but diesel is Â£1.00 a gallon. The{E.E.C}has cut the amount of milk farmers are allowed to produce by 10% when all other expenses are increasing .The{Goverment}has cut the{draining {grants}which is a bad thing for hill land in years to come.
